title: Shopping Website Server
description: Developed backend and API for frontend communication, handling authentication, sign-up, and hosting website product information.

title: Shopping Website
description: Shopping Website with user authentication, sign-up, and secure page navigation, featuring seamless backend server communication via API.

title: Airline Flight Management Application
description: Application enables airline employees to efficiently manage passenger seat assignments and update passenger information. It supports adding and removing passengers and saves all data in a straightforward text file format.

title: Mini Arcade Machine
description: Developed and programmed the game, and designed the circuit for an Arduino microcontroller within a mini portable arcade machine. Both the program and circuit were optimized to operate efficiently within the power constraints of a 9V battery.

title: Disaster Victim Management System
description: Terminal-based application assisting social workers in managing disaster victims. Communicates with a database to track victims, locations, supplies, inquiries, and more.
